name: Federal Flat Tax
description: Collection of taxes for the Federation used to fund all of the operation within the Federation. A flat tax will be administered for any transactions including sales, rent, contracts, work parties, real estate sales, etc.

properties.Title: Sales Tax
properties.UserDescription: A flat tax of 20% on all sales within the federation. An exception is made for certain government districts, as well as skillless players actively selling. It also takes into account companies.
